body:
Hey guys!
i was just wondering how many/ or what maps you guys have made?
also i wondered who  made the original maps :3
body_tagged:
Hey guys!
i was just wondering how many/ or what maps you guys have made?
also i wondered who  made the original maps :3
title: What maps have you made?

replies.body:
Ciutat, Orbis, Clearways, Creta, Creta 2, Herba, Drumfire, Gyrus, and Terris. I might've missed a few :3

Also, most of the classics were made by G_SKIPPY and ParaPenguin.
replies.body_tagged:
Ciutat, Orbis, Clearways, Creta, Creta 2, Herba, Drumfire, Gyrus, and Terris. I might've missed a few :3

Also, most of the classics were made by G_SKIPPY and ParaPenguin.

replies.body:
15 Maps in total:
  -12 submitted maps
    - 11 accepted
      - 1 idk what happened
    - 1 denied
    - 3 in the rotation
  - 3 getting released soon
  
Nebula:
  -DTM:
    -Bleened Rings (was in the rotations)
    -Actyon (currently getting revamped)
  -CTW:
    -Tyrsus (accepted, don't know why it isn't in the rots)
CTH:
  -CTSS I (Capture The SpaceStation) (was in the rots)
  -CTSS II (was in the rots)
Nexus:
  -Travincal I (in the rots)
  -Travincal II (in the rots)
  -Travincal III (in the rots)
  -Special Box (not submitted yet)
Avicade:
  -Red Alert:
    -Dirilis (accepted, never got in the rots due the update)
    -Estrella (accepted, never got in the rots)
    -Squerant (not submitted yet)
  -Minotaur:
    -Upjump (denied, cuz it was too crazy xD)
  -Chroma:
    -Arlet (accepted, 3rd place in a contest, never in the rots due update)
Walls:
  -secret Project (not the map name, still in progress)

replies.body:
As for the "original maps", I suspect you're talking about MCZone rots maps, so the authors are the following:

Fissura - G_SKIPPY
Divines - G_SKIPPY
Senex 1 - ParaPenguin
Ternio - ParaPenguin
Venomous: DTM - G_SKIPPY
Zalidor - Naskel
Venomous: TDM - G_SKIPPY
Rigor Mortis - Bumblebeetle13
Senex 2 - ParaPenguin & ParaPhoenix
Rendezvous 1 - ParaPenguin
Castle Adventure - Jessamania
Quintus - G_SKIPPY
Crusade - G_SKIPPY
Decay - G_SKIPPY
Rendezvous 2 - ParaPenguin
Dust Devils - Bumblebeetle13
Frostbite - ParaPenguin

As for removed, original maps:

Gladiator - ParaPenguin
Haze - G_SKIPPY
Rapture - G_SKIPPY
Checkmate - ObsidianFire99
Titans - G_SKIPPY
